meaningMnemonic: If you think someone is trying to <kanji>annoy</kanji> you at <kanji>random</kanji>, just pay attention and you'll see that they have a <vocabulary>complex</vocabulary> annoying pattern they're using on you. Once you figure that out, it won't annoy you as much and you'll win!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
